'''Undersecretary''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

## Background

A minor official tasked with ensuring the Huana working for the RDC follow proper Rauatai etiquette. He's not doing a very good job.

## Interactions

{{Interactions
|companion       =
|wares           =
|stronghold      =
|rest            =
|quests_started  =
|quests_involved =
|none            = 
|other           =
* He is a source of much amusement for [Tebe](/tebe/).
}}
[Category:Sayuka characters](/categorySayukaCharacters/)
